QuestData.Title: Take Me To Your Leader
QuestData.Description: I am glad you are here, $n.$b$bThis... Khadgar, the archmage who found my message, has called a meeting.$b$bHe wishes to meet us at the entrance to the city as soon as possible.$b$bWill you accompany me? I have the strangest feeling that he will not be alone.
QuestData.RewardText: Hello again, champion. I see we are all here now.
